short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restrict Personal Gmail accounts in Business network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enable SSO for your applications using this simple extension.

- The miniOrange Single Sign-On Plug-in will allow the user to seamlessly sign into all the available web applications. 
- The plug-in communicates securely with the miniOrange server to fetch the user credentials when signing into an available application.
- The plug-in does not store the credentials anywhere and they are discarded once the user has signed into the application.
